text: There are two kinds of people who try to perfect their lives, but both are unable to do so. One category, Shilapuravapad explains is that of the empiric philosophers who try to speculate and try to understand what is truth. So using their own limited understanding, their intelligence, they think they will be able to understand Lord. Although they cannot understand Lord. but they think they can understand the creator of the universe. So that is not sign of intelligence, but they think they are intelligent. So they are called Ganesh. So they can never understand God. And then there is another category. In India you will find many such people and otherwise also. this categories. categories, send Dementilist, they think they have attained perfection of life. Sehjiya, they take things very easily. What is the Yes, so discussing preaching we have to understand. The preaching is based on chanting, hearing, following, rules and regulations very nicely. If we are ourselves, not following what shall we preach? So thus Sanatana Goswami told Hari Dastaka, some people behave very nicely. Means they will follow, regulative principles, rules and regulations very nicely, but they will not preach. Others they preach but do not behave nicely. But you are so nice that you behave, you follow and then you preach also. This is what we have to do. We have to be very, very strict in following the rules and regulations and then preach. Then there would be perfection. So this we have to take help of devotees, how to follow rules and regulations nicely. Hare Krishna Prabhu, you said that we should follow Racharya and preach. but once I heard in one lecture that we should do only Yes, so authorized service will be nothing but service for preaching. So preaching is a mission just like army, army fights a war, but then only few people are there on the battle front.
speaker: Speaker 4

text: Others are somebody's drivers carrying out the supplies, somebody's store keeper taking charge of the store, somebody's doctor also among the doctors healing the wounded soldiers. Some people are there actually on the front fighting but all of them are actually soldiers. preacher. But somebody will be required to cook so that other people can honor the salam and go out for preaching. Somebody will be required to clean. Somebody will be required to manage. Somebody will be required to ride, read, paint, code etc. So all of them are preachers. So that is why we have to do. Preaching means assigned service. If
speaker: Speaker 4

text: Designing, developing a website is required for preaching. get absorbed completely designed best of the websites and that is actually preaching. So preaching is not whimsical but under proper just like commander tells you do this service you fight in this way you this is order for you. So under the order of the commander or our authorities we have to execute the service.
speaker: Speaker 4
